title: Finance Minister calls on AJK’s President seeking suggestions for new budget
content:
MIRPUR (AJK): May 16 (APP): Minister for Finance Abdul Majid Khan called on the AJK President Barrister Sultan Mehmood Chaudhry, on Monday and briefed him of the budgetary preparations and seeking his suggestions to make the upcoming new fiscal year (2022 ~23) development-oriented and people’s friendly.
The finance minister also apprised the president of the recommendations made by various ministers and departments in finalizing the forthcoming budget.
The President of AJK was also given a detailed briefing about the performance of the Bank of Azad Jammu and Kashmir and about the scope of its expansion in the future.
Moreover, later in the day, President AJ&K Bank Khawar Saeed and Vice President Ehtesham Malik also called on the AJK President Barrister Sultan Mehmood Chaudhary.
